assertion.value: All authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed in the study involving human participants were in accordance with Al-Ain Medical Human Research Ethics Committee (AMHREC) according to the national regulations (Approval numbers 10/09 and ERH-2015-3241 15-115) and with the 1964 Helsinki Declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards. Samples were collected from the patient after obtaining written informed consents from the parents.
